representation_information.name: MP3 (common name). MPEG Layer III audio encoding is defined in two ISO/IEC specification families (MPEG-1: 11172-3 and MPEG-2: 13818-3).
representation_information.description: Employs perceptual coding, an approach based on psychoacoustic models that permit the codec to discard or reduce the precision of audio components that are less audible to human hearing. MP3 is shorthand for Layer III from MPEG-1 and -2 audio compression specifications.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
